attributes.action: stop teaching compulsary welsh in high and primary schools in wales
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: welsh is a dying language and the people who learn it just dont want to and no one talks it unless you live right out in the real welshy parts of wales so why waste your childs GCSE on welsh when they can chose and extra subject that they want to do and not waste it on welsh
